Sentencas: In this study, various compositions of (30-x) SrO-xBaO-10Al(2)O(3)-45SiO(2)-5B(2)O(3)-10Y(2)O(3) (mol%) (5 <= x <= 25) were synthesized using the melt-quench technique.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: The as-prepared glasses were characterized by X-ray diffraction, micro-hardness testing, dilatometry, and scanning electron microscopy to determine their thermal and mechanical properties.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Powders of the glasses were used to make diffusion couples with Crofer 22 APU (interconnect) and yttria stabilized zirconia (YSZ) for the interfacial study.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: Diffusion couples of the pre-oxidized Crofer 22 APU/glasses and YSZ/glasses were tested for 500 hat 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: The coefficients of thermal expansion obtained for all the glasses were in the required range for applications in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: The highest hardness and fracture toughness were obtained for the glass with x = 10 mol% due to the mixed modifier effect.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components

Sentencas: However, the glass with x = 15 mol% exhibited better adhesion with YSZ and Crofer 22 APU.
Titulo: Mechanical and thermal properties of SrO/BaO modified Y2O3-Al2O3-B2O3-SiO2 glasses and their compatibility with solid oxide fuel cell components
